heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Preservation and Protection and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Preservation and Protection and 
other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (Continuation of 
Sections 4, 5 and 6 of Part 2) (No. 2) Order 2022.

title: Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No.
heading: 2. The amendments effected by sections 4, 5 and 6 of Part 2 of the Health
text_raw:
2. The amendments effected by sections 4, 5 and 6 of Part 2 of the Health 
(Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public 
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020) shall continue in operation for the period 
beginning on the 1st day of July 2022 and ending on the 30th day of September

title: Protection and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020(Continuation of Part 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No.155 of 
2020) extended the operation of the amendments effected by Part 2 of the 
Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020(No. 1 of 2020) from their original expiry date of 9 
May 2020 until 19 June 2020. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020(Continuation of Part 2) (No. 2) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 
207 of 2020) extended the operation of the amendments effected by Part 2 of 
the Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 until 10 August 2020. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020(Continuation of Part 2) (No. 3) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 
285 of 2020) extended the operation of the amendments effected by sections 4, 
5 and 6 of Part 2 of the Health (Preservation and Protection and other 
Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 until 31 March 2021. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020(Continuation of Part 2) Order 2021 (S.I. No. 133 of 
2021) further extended the operation of the amendments effected by Part 2 of 
the Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 until 30 June 2021. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020(Continuation of Sections 4, 5 and 6 of Part 2) Order 
2021 (S.I. No. 325 of 2021) extended the operation of the amendments effected 
by sections 4, 5 and 6 of Part 2 of the Health (Preservation and Protection and 
other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 until 8 February

2022. 

The Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020(Continuation of Sections 4, 5 and 6 of Part 2) Order 
2022 (S.I. No. 47 of 2022) extended the operation of the amendments effected 
by sections 4, 5 and 6 of Part 2 of the Health (Preservation and Protection and 
other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 until 30 June 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [301] 

This Order further extends the operation of the amendments effected by 
sections 4, 5 and 6 Part 2 of the Health (Preservation and Protection and other 
Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 until 30 September
